metadata.title: CVE-2022-3669 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4 and classified asproblematic. This issue affects the function AP4_AvccAtom::Create of thecomponent mp4edit. The manipulation leads to memory leak. The attack may beinitiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may beused. The identifier VDB-212009 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
